title: Outdoor Research Firemark Gloves
features: Hybrid leather and fabric finger sidewalls for superior flex at joints and protection at high abrasion points
Hook and Loop wrist closure provides a secure fit
Pull loop for easy on/off; doubles as attachment loop for securing gloves to jacket or pack
description: Firemark Gloves are highly dexterous, leather FR combat gloves. These feature Precisions Grip, specifically designed for seamless contact between index finger and thumb, which provides next-to-skin tactility which is perfect for moving Selector Switch. These gloves have lightly padded leather knuckles and back of finger leather reinforcements for protection at impact points while maintaining dexterity.

title: Glove Station The Impulse High Dexterity Tactical Gloves
